misc: Bags Miura irons and is rumoured to sleep with them.
biography: Miso, a formidable presence on the greens, brings a unique blend of intensity and focus to the Hector Trophée. Known for his meticulous preparation and unwavering dedication, Miso has become a familiar face at this tournament, marked by his impressive displays of skill and determination.

Representing Hirsala Golf, Miso is recognized for his exceptional iron play, owing to his revered Miura irons, which rumour has it, he cherishes so dearly that he even sleeps with them. This dedication to his tools of the trade is mirrored in his approach to the game, where precision and strategy are paramount.

With nine past appearances, Miso's experience is undeniable, making the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025 his tenth. His career highlight came when he seized victory at Hector Trophée, a testament to his skill and perseverance. Although the Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, Miso's ambition remains undeterred.
As he prepares for Hector Trophée 2025, Miso remains an active and respected competitor, with his eyes set on further glory.
